View a Schedule





1 - Schedule Details

This section of the page contains the relevant schedule details. Bear in mind that drop details won't be shown for KGB+N schedules.

2 - XML Viewer

This area of the page shows the schedule XML.

3 - Controls

At the top right of the XML viewer there are a group of controls. From left to right these are:

  • Copy the schedule XML to the clipboard.
  • Examine the review comments for this schedule - more on schedule reviews here.
  • Review the schedule.
  • Edit the schedule
